LanguageData.RM.RemnantsBaseDescription: A downed ship of one of the factions.
LanguageData.RM.ForcedWeatherCooldown: Currently on cooldown. Weather can be changed in {0}.
LanguageData.RM.ForcedWeatherDesc: Choose what weather type should be forced on the local map.
LanguageData.RM.SunNoLongerBlocked: Sun is no longer being blocked.
LanguageData.RM.Reward_TransporterLoot_Desc: You can loot everything from the transporter
LanguageData.RM.ToggleInvisibilityDesc: Toggle the mechanoids psychical engine to manipulate the visual centers of everyone nearby, rendering them unable to perceive it.
LanguageData.RM.JumpDesc: Order the mechanoid to use its built-in skimmer pack to jump to a specific location.
LanguageData.RM.OnCooldown: On cooldown. It will be available in {0}.
LanguageData.RM.ToggleAllegianceOverlayDesc: Toggle this mechanoids allegiance color overlay.
